# The curl extension

This extension provides support for using CURL - Client URL Library.

## Configuration options

### PHP_EXT_CURL

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enables the extension.

### PHP_EXT_CURL_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Builds extension as shared.
